title: Fix incorrect ASIN, price, and product name display

requirements.text: Audit and fix the ASIN field values in the mock product data returned by backend/main.mo searchProducts method to ensure all ASINs are valid 10-character alphanumeric Amazon identifiers (e.g., B08N5WRWNW, B09G9FPHY6) instead of placeholder or incorrect values
acceptanceCriteria: All products returned by searchProducts have valid ASIN format (10 alphanumeric characters)
ASINs are realistic Amazon.in product identifiers
No duplicate ASINs exist in the mock data

requirements.text: Audit and fix the price field values in the mock product data in backend/main.mo to ensure prices are accurate, realistic, and consistent with the product category and type, using actual Amazon.in marketplace pricing patterns (e.g., ₹299 for kitchen containers, ₹1499 for electronics, ₹499 for fashion items)
acceptanceCriteria: All product prices are realistic for their respective categories
Prices align with Indian market standards (using ₹ currency)
Price values are consistent with estimated sales and revenue calculations

requirements.text: Verify that the ProductCard component in frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx is correctly reading and displaying the productName field from the Product data structure, ensuring the actual product name appears as the primary heading instead of placeholder or missing text
acceptanceCriteria: ProductCard displays the productName field as the primary heading
Product names are visible and properly formatted on all product cards
No empty, null, or placeholder values appear in the product name position

requirements.text: Update the mock product data in backend/main.mo to include realistic, detailed product names for each item that match their category and specifications (e.g., 'Borosil Glass Food Storage Container Set 500ml - Pack of 4', 'boAt Airdopes 141 Bluetooth Truly Wireless in Ear Earbuds', 'Safari Thorium 55 Cms Hardsided Check-in Luggage')
acceptanceCriteria: All products have descriptive, realistic product names
Product names include relevant specifications (capacity, model, features)
Names match the product category and price point
Names follow Amazon.in product naming conventions

requirements.text: Add data validation logging in backend/main.mo searchProducts method that verifies each product object contains valid non-empty values for productName, asin, and price fields before returning the results, logging any products with missing or invalid data
acceptanceCriteria: Backend logs any products with missing productName, asin, or price
Validation occurs before products are returned to frontend
Invalid products are either fixed or filtered out from results

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
Ensure ASIN format is exactly 10 alphanumeric characters
Use realistic Amazon.in product data patterns
nonGoals: Changing the Product type schema structure
Modifying the ProductCard component layout or styling
Adding new fields beyond fixing existing productName, asin, and price
